links.title: Apple (AAPL) Given a $203.00 Price Target at Royal Bank of Canada
links.description: Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) has been given a $203.00 price target by stock analysts at Royal Bank of Canada in a research report issued to clients and investors on Wednesday, April 11th. The firm presently has a "buy" rating on the iPhone maker's stock. Royal Bank of Canada's price target points to a potential upside of 25.06% [...]
